title: Is There Anyone Other Than Me Who Would Travel Back in Time Just To Eat ‘Pizza’? - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Oneshot   Short Story   Time Travel
author: Tacos/Squid Rice   タコス/イカ飯
description:
Do you want to eat pizza?

That's it. That's all there is to it. That's really all there is to it.
In front of a girl wandering around the house late at night for that purpose, 'another version of herself' appeared! ?

'I'm kinda from the future.'

To the other person who suddenly begins to say such a thing,
She handed over a time machine.>
